meanings.sent1: She gave him the kissiest hug when he returned from his trip.
meanings.sent2: The puppy's kisses were the kissiest of all.
meanings.sent3: The little girl's doll had the kissiest face you've ever seen!
meanings.sent4: The sun setting behind the mountains painted the sky with the kissiest hues.
meanings.sent5: The grandmother's cookies had the kissiest taste, bringing back memories of childhood.

meanings.sent1: Sarah is the kissiest person I know; she loves giving hugs and kisses.
meanings.sent2: The kissiest couple in school always holds hands and cuddles.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed to be in a kissiest mood, rubbing against everyone's legs.
meanings.sent4: The flower garden in spring is the kissiest place, with bees pollinating the blooms.
meanings.sent5: The kissiest puppy in the litter wagged its tail excitedly when anyone approached.
